math.geom2d
Class Translation2D

java.lang.Object
  math.geom2d.AffineTransform2D
      math.geom2d.Translation2D
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bijection2D, Transform2D
public class Translation2D
extends AffineTransform2D

Transform each point by translating it by a given vector.

Method Detail

isMotion

public boolean isMotion()
Description copied from class: AffineTransform2D
Check if the transform is a motion, i.e. a compound of translations and rotation. Motion remains area and orientation (directed or undireced) of shapes unchanged.

Overrides:
isMotion in class AffineTransform2D
Returns:
true in case of isometry.

getCoefficients

public double[] getCoefficients()
Description copied from class: AffineTransform2D
return coefficients of the transform. Result is an array of 6 double.
